gw.plugin.note

Class INoteTemplateSerializer

  • gw.plugin.note.INoteTemplateSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin

    public class INoteTemplateSerializer
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    Serializes and deserializes note template descriptors. Typically, descriptors persist as XML, as such implementations of this class understand the format of note template descriptors and can read and write them as XML.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      INoteTemplateDescriptor read(Reader readerSource)
      De-serialize from the indicated reader to an INoteTemplateDescriptor implementation
      void write(Writer writerTarget, INoteTemplateDescriptor descriptor)
      Serialize the indicated template descriptor to the Writer.

    • Method Detail

      • read

        INoteTemplateDescriptor read(Reader readerSource)
        De-serialize from the indicated reader to an INoteTemplateDescriptor implementation
        Parameters:
        readerSource - A reader containing a serialized template descriptor.
        Returns:
        A class implementing IDocTemplateDescriptor.

      • write

        void write(Writer writerTarget,
         INoteTemplateDescriptor descriptor)
        Serialize the indicated template descriptor to the Writer.
        Parameters:
        writerTarget - The writer to which the serialized descriptor should be written
        descriptor - The template descriptor to be serialized.
